alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 2:57AM EST until January 26 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River near Griffin affecting Fayette and Spalding Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint River near Griffin. * WHEN...From this morning to late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands...fields and pasture upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 16 or Newnan Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 11.5 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river will rise to 12.1 feet this morning, then fall to 10 feet Saturday evening. Although additional rises are possible with the expected rainfall through Saturday, the river is expected to remain below flood stage through Tuesday. - Flood stage is 12 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 300 PM EST.
